channel.title: 🏢 Technical University of Berlin on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Technical University of Berlin on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Accelerating Matroid Optimization through Fast Imprecise Oracles
item.description: Fast imprecise oracles drastically reduce query times in matroid optimization, achieving near-optimal performance with few accurate queries.
